thread.title: Foo Fighters Announce Glastonbury Gig at Surprise U.K. Concert: Watch It Here
thread.title_full: Foo Fighters Announce Glastonbury Gig at Surprise U.K. Concert: Watch It Here

author: Billboard
title: Foo Fighters Announce Glastonbury Gig at Surprise U.K. Concert: Watch It Here
text:
Foo Fighters 
The Foo Fighters are playing their first concert of 2017... right now. 
On Friday (Feb. 24), Dave Grohl and company announced plans to perform at this year’s Glastonbury Music Festival by live-streaming a surprise show from Frome, England’s Cheese and Grain venue. 
The massive yearly fest is set for June 21-25 this year, at its usual post in the village of Pilton in Somerset, England. So far, Radiohead is the only other confirmed performer . The Foo Fighters were originally scheduled to play in 2015, but had to drop out after Grohl seriously injured his leg. 
Could this signal new music to follow up 2014’s Sonic Highways ? 
Watch the concert below and find out in real time what the Foos have been up to.
